title: New: Flo Morrissey – If You Can't Love This All Goes Away
body:
Photo: [Daisy Frost](http://yatsontour.tumblr.com/)

Whilst away on holiday I missed this gem from London teenage songstress **Flo Morrissey**, entitled _If You Can’t Love This All Goes Away_. Pulling from her eclectic range of influences, with the likes of **Antony & The Johnsons** and **Billie Holiday** both appearing to form inspiration for her new track, **Flo’s** vocals are as elegant as ever, singing with a maturity far beyond her modest years. Whilst the production may at times be a little iffy, there’s no telling just how far this beautiful young woman could go with the right care and investment.
